text:
<@UUXMCJQ15>, not snarky at all :wink:

That's the kind of feedback we need!

You're right about G2.

We had to exclude it from our <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Xm54_rtT00imBMBtgOQ4UeFwLeE7rzJJmUcZKjyiY0k/edit?usp=sharing|dataset> (along with a few other websites) because it was blocking our crawler.

We may add a disclaimer in that specific section and will definitely keep it in mind for our future studies.

Thanks :pray::skin-tone-2:

text:
Mio's new marketing intern wrote her first blog post. Sharing because:
1) I was blown away by the quality. It took me 20 mins to review, edit, and publish.
2) It's on Slack etiquette and we can all always do with a refresher!

<https://dispatch.m.io/slack-etiquette/>

attachments.fallback: News about Slack, Microsoft Teams, Webex & Team Collaboration: Slack Etiquette Guide: 10 Do’s And Don’ts
attachments.text: Slack etiquette is a set of principles that makes sure you and your team use Slack in a productive and comfortbale manner. See what to include here.
attachments.title: Slack Etiquette Guide: 10 Do’s And Don’ts

text:
:earth_asia: Are you using *georedirect* or *geocontent* in your *geomarketing* strategy:question:

This <https://croct.com/blog/post/personalization-location?utm_medium=community&utm_source=slack&utm_campaign=20220412.PO.BL.location|blog post> will help those who are still relying on *georedirect* or have any doubts about what's technically the best way to *optimize conversions based on the user's location*  :bust_in_silhouette::globe_with_meridians: :pushpin:.

Here you'll find:

• The difference between georedirect and geocontent
• The benefits of localized content
• The drawbacks of IP geolocation APIs
• How to be independent of devs to create localized content.

attachments.fallback: Croct Blog: How to use the user's location to implement personalized content
attachments.text: While marketers create geomarketing strategies and look to optimize web pages based on the user's location, developers feel overloaded with minor changes and content implementations. Understanding the drawbacks of IP geolocation APIs and knowing their alternatives can be game-changing.
attachments.title: How to use the user's location to implement personalized content

elements.text: will help those who are still relying on
or have any doubts about what's technically the best way to
optimize conversions based on the user's location
The difference between georedirect and geocontent
The drawbacks of IP geolocation APIs
How to be independent of devs to create localized content.

text:
Have you ever written a large 2000-word article but the client rejected it completely?

It happened to me but I thought "Why to waste all this content?"

So I converted it into an ebook and released it. Read more here:

<https://www.linkedin.com/posts/israninavin_conversionrateoptimization-hiring-vocabartist-activity-6919886277953679361-HW1O?utm_source=linkedin_share&utm_medium=member_desktop_web|https://www.linkedin.com/posts/israninavin_conversionrateoptimization-hiring-vocabartist-activity-6919886277953679361-HW1O?utm_source=linkedin_share&utm_medium=member_desktop_web>
